product_name: Menasha Ridge Press The Best of the Appalachian Overnight Hikes
long_description: Discover the best overnight hikes along the Appalachian Trail with this comprehensive guide. Authors: Victoria Logue, Frank Logue and Leonard M. Adkins. Softcover; 177 pages; maps. Menasha Ridge Press; copyright 2004. Trail profiles preview each trail's unique flora, fauna and history. Trailhead maps and driving directions put you on the trail. Hike difficulty ratings help you choose the right hike. Trail routing changes keep you on track. Explore Maine's Moxie Bald, Vermont's Killington Peak, Pennsylvania's Blue Mtn, Virginia's Southern Shenandoah and Georgia's Tray Mtn. Wilderness.
short_description: Discover the best overnight hikes along the Appalachian Trail with this comprehensive guide.
